title: Bus Mall
body: This project involved an advertisement company that wanted to know which products were most popular, based on focus group member votes. The site randomizes 14 product images, displaying 3 non-matching at a time, that the focus member can vote between. After 15 votes, the data in compiled into a chart that the advertisement company can analyze.

title: Equip
body: This project was a team project of 4 students. Our goal with the project was to create pack lists for the experienced/inexperienced for outdoor activities. Then our web app would then send the user to a resource page, where they could find some of those outdoor products. Finally after the user goes on the trip, they can save their experience of the trip in the list tab, by entering in information about their trip.
